description: This one-shot comic book is a prelude to G.I. Joe: Special - Helix comic book series. The story begins with General Hawk informing Duke that Helix has gone missing and uses flashbacks to describe Helix's skills. Includes centerfold (4 page) poster of Snake Eyes and Stormshadow.
name: Helix

volume.name: G.I. Joe: Rise of Cobra: Helix Special - EA Edition

description: It’s DEADPOOL versus SHANG-CHI, the peerless Master of Kung-Fu, in a KUNG-FU MOTORCYCLE RACE! You won’t believe your eyes when you read this all-new, all-action, all-black-and-white one shot in the spirit of the Mighty Marvel Magazines of yore, but ALL-NOW in style!
name: Super Issue

volume.name: Shang-Chi: Master of Kung Fu One-Shot (B&W)

description:
Paradigm City is the city of amnesia--40 years ago, something happened that wiped out the memories of the residents, forcing them to recreate their culture from scattered fragments.

In this world, just four decades old, Roger Smith is a "negotiator"--a go-between for police, citizens and criminals in high-risk diplomatic situations. But something else survives from the forgotten past. They are the MegaDeus, giant robots of apocalyptic power. When crime and madness strike, Roger Smith brings the guilty to justice with a MegaDeus called the Big O.

More than a straight adaptation of the hit Cartoon Network series, the manga includes the prequel to events in the Big O anime, plus many completely new stories.

Chapter Titles

  • Prologue
  • Chapter 1: Take Back a Memory
  • Chapter 2: Electric Bug
  • Chapter 3: Thy Name is Dorothy
name: Vol. 1

description: Little X-Men! Big Adventure! Stars Reborn! Things have changed in Mojoworld as Mojo’s been ousted by Mr. Veech, who’s replaced the The X-Babies - the number one, top-rated stars - with something newer, safer, friendlier, and...more adorable! The X-Babies we know and love aren’t going to sit by and let that happen. And how are the characters from Marvel’s mid-’80s, kid-centric Star Comics line involved? The sleeper hit of the fall starts here!
name: Stars Reborn, Chapter 1: Someone's Been Sleeping In Our bed!

description:
In Paradigm City, the last redoubt of human civilization where no one remembers anything more than 40 years old, Roger Smith is a gentleman negotiator--and the pilot of the giant robot, the Big O. Dorothy, a nearly perfect android, seeks Roger's help when she is caught in a struggle between three men. A beautiful woman asks Roger to track down a ghost ship on the seas of Paradigm Port. A killer stalks the night, carrying out a forgotten contract from 40 years ago. And a driven reporter, Michael Seebach, digs too deep to find the secret of a murderous giant robot who the locals call "The God of Death"...

Chapter Titles

  • Chapter 4: Sisters Dorothy
  • Chapter 5: Ghost Ship and Fallen Angel
  • Chapter 6: No Name, No Memory, No Future
  • Chapter 7: Tief im Schwarzwald
name: Vol. 2

description:
In a city with no past, Roger Smith and the Big O are making history one day at a time.

Something happened 40 years ago that caused the citizens of Paradigm City to lose their memories. Now, forced to piece together a life from scattered fragments, an entire community struggles with its lost identity.

Into this world came the MegaDeus, giant robots of apocalyptic power. One such robot, the Big O, is controlled by Paradigm City's top negotiator, Roger Smith.

Together, these two unlikely heroes bring order to a world teetering on the brink of madness. When crime and mayhem strike, Roger Smith and the Big O are always there to bring the guilty to justice.

Chapter Titles

  • Chapter 8: Big O vs. Big O
  • Chapter 9: My Sweetheart Dorothy
  • Chapter 10: Unto us a Beast is Born
  • Chapter 11: Alcohol, Tobacco & Memories
name: Vol. 3

description:
Can there be a future if there is no past?

Forty years ago, everyone living under the dome of Paradigm City lost their memory. And now, with the past gone forever, the future is being leveraged by a small cadre of powerbrokers, criminals and off the hook lunatics.

Into this world comes the MegaDeus, giant robots of intenible power. One such robot, the Big O, is engineered by Paradigm City's top negotiator, Roger Smith. Together, this dynamic duo of man and machine, works overtime to bring justice to a world teetering on the brink of madness.

In Paradigm City no one has a past and everyone wants a piece of the future. But the question remains: What will the future be like for a city without an identity?

Chapter Titles

  • Chapter 12: To the One I Can't Forget
  • Chapter 13: The Chosen Ones
  • Chapter 14: The Sun Will Rise Again
name: Vol. 4

description:
Something happened 40 years ago to wipe out the memories of everyone living in Paradigm City. The people have lost their past and now they're desperate to grab the best future they possibly can.

Into this dystopia comes Roger Smith, super negotiator and giant robot pilot. Employing a combination of brains and brawn, this hero-for-hire keeps the peace in a city inching towards madness.

Chapter Titles

  • Chapter 15: Another Side of You
  • Chapter 16: In Darkness
  • Chapter 17: Past Lives
name: Vol. 5

description:
In a world where memories are a valuable commodity, Roger Smith must outplay a host a host of disreputable characters all jockeying for the biggest prize of all: Paradigm City!

Ironically, the savvy negotiator has never been too concerned about his own forgotten past. The future, he reasons, is all that matters.

But something unexpected happens to make him change his mind. On the day Dorothy Wayneright disappears, Roger realizes that both the past and the future are indeed a very important part of his life.

Chapter Titles

  • Chapter 18: Little Robot Lost
  • Chapter 19: Angel
  • Chapter 20: The Memory Disk
  • Chapter 21: Roger...
name: Vol. 6
Martin Mystère: Il Colore del Mistero

description: Join a host of spooky yet hardworking monsters as they pop out of closets and try to deliver scares to the children of the world. There's only one catch though -- the Monsters are afraid of the KIDS! When by accident a child ends up in Monsters, Inc. headquarters, mayhem abounds! This graphic adaptation of the Disney/Pixar film Monsters, Inc. is sure to please comics fans and moviegoers as well!

volume.name: I Classici del Fumetto di Repubblica
I Classici del Fumetto di Repubblica

I Classici del Fumetto di Repubblica

I Classici del Fumetto di Repubblica

name: Zio Paperone e i cannoni dello Smuggler
Vol. 1
Vol. 2

description: The Aquans and Terans spent their existences blaming each other for their own faults, warring until there was only one Aquan, a male, and one Teran, a female. Together in love and desperation, they created Novo - a savior born to a world that no longer had use for one. Now trying to discover a history he will never be a part of, can the mystery of his past give him the clues to his future?
name: Volume 1: The Birth of Novo

description: Novo, the wasted messiah of the Aquans and the Terans, finds himself stranded on a new and foreign world, populated by a powerful feline tribe known as the Xennons. Finding an immediate connection with a species who's women and children are threatened by horrid beasts known only as The Enemy, Novo realizes that he may be able to help this world in a way he could never help his own.
name: Volume 2: The Pride

description: Two doomed alien species, the Aquans and the Terans, stand at the brink of extinction, their only solace in blaming the other for their own evolutionary shortcomings. Blame quickly turns to hatred which escalates to a devastating war, decimating the two great cultures. Now all but dead, their only chance is to find peace and hope where only resentment has ever existed - in each other.
name: Issue 1

description: After defeating the Baxter Stockman Robot, and unknown to his brothers, Donatello takes the robot's remains and sequesters them in a secret room hidden in the sewers. Why would he choose to reactivate their old enemy and more importantly, what is this new robot prowling the sewers?

After having to deal with the restrictions of the neighborhood homeowners association, Homer, with a little encouragement from a new neighbor, runs for president of the organization. However, once he takes office, the residents are subject to Homer's ridiculous neighborhood whims -- until something even worse threatens to change life on Evergreen Terrace forever!
name: Homeowner Homer

description:
The chaos of war engulfs the Galaxy...

...Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker have gone on the hunt for Count Dooku and General Grievous...
name: Clone Wars Action!

volume.name: Free Comic Book Day: Star Wars

Looney Tunes and Merrie Melodies Comics

description: No one knows for certain what caused it, but in only six days a zombie plague swept across the Earth, consuming three quarters of the world's population. Disgusted by the sight of the walking dead devouring His precious creation, God has sent back His only Son to once again set right the wrongs of the world. But this time, there's no room to turn the other cheek. This time, the message isn't one of love and compassion. This time, the J-Man is looking to unleash some Wrath of God, because this time Jesus hates zombies!
name: Volume 1

volume.name: Jesus Hates Zombies: Those Slack-Jaw Blues

description: Collects stories from Star Wars: Tales #19  & Star Wars/Conan - Free Comic Book Day 2006 Special.
name: Fan Club Special
